name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **Backend Development**, focusing on building scalable and efficient systems tailored for the healthcare and financial sectors. My proficiency includes **Cloud Services** on **AWS** and **Azure**, enabling me to design robust solutions that enhance scalability and reliability.
I have strong capabilities in **Microservices Architecture** and **API Development**, ensuring seamless integration and communication across services. My solid background in **Systems Design** allows me to create high-performance FinTech solutions that meet stringent compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
Furthermore, I thrive in **Team Collaboration** environments, whereby I leverage my experience with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, contributing to the development of enterprise-level platforms that utilize AI/ML for predictive analytics and intelligent automation.
